message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer, but $20,000 is a bit out of my range. I'm really interested in this product, but my budget is capped at $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Hi Bob, I appreciate you countering.  While I understand your budget, $20,000 is closer to my target price. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
